name: Konnyaku House
description:
【Contents】
It is a konnyaku house.
It is not a haunted house.
It is a VR game that surprises people coming into the mansion with konnyaku.
Manipulate the fishing rod well and surprise a lot of people.

【Environment】
Windows10 64bit
GeForce GTX 970
HTC Vive

【Sounds】
ザ・マッチメイカァズ（http://osabisi.sakura.ne.jp/m2/）
効果音ラボ（http://soundeffect-lab.info）
